argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ply1moncl.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ply1moncl.x | |- X = ( var1 ` R ) |
| 3 |  | ply1moncl.n | |- N = ( mulGrp ` P ) |
| 4 |  | ply1moncl.e | |- .^ = ( .g ` N ) |
| 5 |  | ply1moncl.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_ply1ring | |- ( R e. Ring -> P e. Ring ) |
| 7 | 3 | #P_ringmgp | |- ( P e. Ring -> N e. Mnd ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Ring -> N e. Mnd ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ D e. NN0 ) -> N e. Mnd ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ D e. NN0 ) -> D e. NN0 ) |
| 11 | 2, 1, 5 | #P_vr1cl | |- ( R e. Ring -> X e. B ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ D e. NN0 ) -> X e. B ) |
| 13 | 3, 5 | #P_mgpbas | |- B = ( Base ` N ) |
| 14 | 13, 4 | #P_mulgnn0cl | |- ( ( N e. Mnd /\ D e. NN0 /\ X e. B ) -> ( D .^ X ) e. B ) |
| 15 | 9, 10, 12, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ D e. NN0 ) -> ( D .^ X ) e. B ) |
